channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “It Only Helps”: Robert Eggers Discusses Next Movie Plan After Nosferatu’s Clear Box Office Success
item.description: Robert Eggers reflects on Nosferatu’s box office success and teases plans for his next film, continuing his trend of bold storytelling in horror.

item.title: The MCU’s Recent Fantastic Four Reveal Has Finally Convinced Me It Will Nail The 1 Character I Was Most Worried About
item.description: The Fantastic Four is potentially one of the riskiest movies on the slate for the MCU, but if done right, it could kickstart the next era.

item.title: After Jason Momoa's Lobo Casting I'm Convinced Henry Cavill Can Join James Gunn's DC Universe And Be Redeemed After His Superman Run Was Cut Short
item.description: Jason Momoa is joining James Gunn's DCU as Lobo, and his casting gives me hope that another Justice League actor can join him and get redemption.
